text: {{Infobox comics creator |image=Batton Lash.jpg |imagesize= |caption=Batton Lash |alt= |birth_name= |birth_date= |birth_place=Brooklyn, New York, U.S. |death_date= |death_place=San Diego, California, U.S. |nationality=American |area= |cartoonist=Y |write= |art= |pencil= |ink= |edit= |publish= |letter= |color= |alias= |signature= |signature_alt= |notable works= |awards= |website= |subcat=American }} Batton Lash (October 29, 1953 â€“ January 12, 2019) was an American comics creator. He was best known for the series Wolff and Byrd, Counselors of the Macabre (aka Supernatural Law). He won many awards for his work, including an Inkpot Award, an Independent Book Publishers Association's Benjamin Franklin Award, an Eisner Award, and nominations for two Harvey Awards. Lash died at the age of 65 from brain cancer in San Diego, California. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Writers from Brooklyn Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers
title: Batton Lash
